description: This file defines a Flutter widget named AITab that provides a user interface for asking AI-related questions about stock symbols. It allows users to input a stock symbol and a question, then sends this query to an AI provider and displays the response.

classes.name: AITab
classes.description: A stateful widget that encapsulates the AI question interface.

classes.name: _AITabState
classes.description: State class managing the internal state and UI of AITab.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Cleans up the text controllers to prevent memory leaks.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the AI input interface, including text fields, buttons, and answer display.
